pubSub.local

Class SubscriptionManagerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • pubSub.local.SubscriptionManagerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISubscriptionManagerProxy

    public class SubscriptionManagerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubscriptionManagerProxy
    MUST IMPLEMENT the Singleton Design Pattern and already implements the Proxy Design Pattern exposes the subscribe, and unsubscribe methods to the clients
    Author:
    kkontog, ktsiouni, mgrigori, qjames2, tzhu63, zzhan746, mgianco2, rblack43
